summary: I've made it clear that I have a huge dislike of Apple's yearly update cycle for their software (and hardware, to be honest).  It's bad from a software perspective because you're giving people a lot of change all at once with a high probability that something will go wrong.  You're also constantly playing catch up with the rest of the world...
